post.body: no kiddin! Hey everybody: DM more than 140 for when you just can't figure out how to be pithy.
congrats on the discovery-HUGE! I can't wait to hear what it is so I can help drive traffic to you.
what are they? What is your voice?
i just DM you with -26 characters. It went through so it seems!
you do have a good voice...what is your voice? Do share.
because of http://www.tweetbeep.com, I saw your on twitter and communicating being on Your Brand Radio today - HUGE SHOW!
is counting down to a soldout Les Brown on Thursday 12-18. You must register on-line http://www.gvchamber.com/les.html now!
good luck with your evaluations. I am sure what you learn will apply well to your future and others
I did hear it from you first. 2nd Cowher! All in favor...
thanks! smart mktg is my buy list...adding revenge of brand x now!
to be independent in Colorado!
: Found you through Twitter Grader (http://twitter.grader.com) nice work! I will check out your work in case I can refer you.
96.3% for me oh yea! my tweet cloud says I talk about Julie a lot -- ya think!?
good morning mr. sunshine ;)
I hear your radio show is going to be awesome!
love to see the phone pounding recruiter! How is business?
nice reminder for me to check out eclub. I just followed @eclub which is right up my alley!
pop over to espressole cafe in Greenwood Village, CO or listen live on www.PersonalBoardofAdvisors.com - volume up on widget folks.
Getting FIRED UP! Your Brand Radio in two hours and I can tell by the regulars and newbees coming that the energy will be through the roof
11,000th reg on my site Tues: David Perry http://tinyurl.com/4x7hhz good stuff on recruiting, but no posted yet, now 11,100-snooze ya lose
RT @Maverick007 I'll be on Your Brand Radio tomorrow with @DavidSandusky --google it and tune in
julie has the best seat in the house for Les Brown-glad I'm next to her
Julie and I looking forward to hearing Les Brown this morning in intimate setting. thanks to @gvchamber and @markcrowley_den
Good Morning! Hoped out of bed extra early this morning and excited for the day. Make it great.
A valued referral just came my way-a successful business owner who plans to grow in '09. Beats planning to participate in a recession, you?
off to the first Christmas party of the season. LHH does a great job putting on this lunch party every year for their clients and partners
loving FB pages works to bring guest & subject ideas to Your Brand Radio & forum for discussion after - on and offline connecting at best
showing very sr executive how to add value & leverage LinkedIn, Personal Board of Advisors, etc
LOVE to hear from you on this new post from Carlos. What did you give up in order to be successful? http://tinyurl.com/668o5e
looking for business or career type books? Here is my short list http://tinyurl.com/7dojxy - what would you add for 2009?
I just may tweet more in '09 (easy since I did not put a full '08 in) - so much to share.
follow @easton - I learned a lot from from Know More Media time and he is a really good guy
get inspired by the not so elderly entrepreneurs http://tinyurl.com/8nd3ju
Going though Your Brand Radio withdrawals, but back Jan 8 w/ even better quality and toys thanks to @markcrowley_denver
RT @muellertime I finally posted my very first video...it's about YBR and Project Cure, a great cause http://TwitPWR.com/10H/
meeting w/ potential fullfilment/distribution partner-exciting step for Julie
use common sense if you get notice of pics of you from places like thumpfrighten-com-even from those you know-DELETE
social media in '09-what stands out to you? http://tinyurl.com/8bkuk7
Happy Monday all! I hope you have a fun and productive last few days of 2008!
Julie's Gocco screen printer has arrived!!! This thing is cool! Another new toy for JSDesign and the product/business extension continues
